title.narrative: Interfaith dialogue as part of peace and development

description.narrative: Interfaith dialogue as part of peace and development -project raises awareness about the role of religions in creating peace and supporting human rights in societies. The aim is to give teachers more tools to teach about religions role in human rights and migration and build the pupils capacity to interact with people from different backgrounds. By workshops and schoolvisits we offer information about migration and reasons behind it especially from religion related view. Teachers are given ready-made exerci ses to work with in the classroom. The pupils can take part and learn also form each other. Especially now when Europe is facing current challenges with migration and people's reactions to it we need more tools to raise empathy and create open atmosphere i n schools to discuss about it as part of education.The two-year project has been granted 39 000 euro government support.
